task.name: g.mkfontcap
task.description: Generates the font configuration file by scanning various directories for fonts.

parameter.name: extradirs
parameter.label: List of extra directories to scan
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of extra directories to scan for Freetype-compatible fonts as well as the defaults (see documentation)

flag.name: o
flag.description: Overwrite font configuration file if already existing

flag.name: s
flag.description: Write font configuration file to standard output instead of $GISBASE/etc
